name: Musical Pilot
description:
Musical Pilot is a 1-player arcade game for the 8-bit Atari computer.

The player controls a small airplane which can fly up and down on a musical scale. As the player flies, balloons which correspond to musical notes appear on the screen, and the appropriate note is played. The player tries to hit the balloon with their propeller. If the player strikes all balloons in a song, they advance to a more difficult stage. There is 4 stages in all, and the player gets a total of 4 chances to try to reach and complete the final stage. The player receives 1 point for each balloon destroyed. If a balloon is missed, the player must repeat that level, and can not advance to the highest rank.
